abstract: In total, Jeffrey B. Kindler, who resigned unexpectedly as chief executive and chairman, will receive $9.5 million in cash in addition to stock and retirement benefits.
snippet: In total, Jeffrey B. Kindler, who resigned unexpectedly as chief executive and chairman, will receive $9.5 million in cash in addition to stock and retirement benefits.
lead_paragraph: Pfizer, the world’s largest pharmaceutical company, said in a regulatory filing on Thursday that it had agreed to give Jeffrey B. Kindler a $4.5 million severance payment after his sudden retirement on Sunday as chairman and chief executive.

headline.main: Pfizer to Pay Its Ex-Chief $4.5 Million in Severance
headline.print_headline: Pfizer to Pay Its Ex-Chief $4.5 Million In Severance
